name: Kwasimodo
overview: Kwasimodo is an arcade platform game for one player. Esmerelda the beautiful virgin is being held prisoner in the Wicked Warlords dungeons. Swasimodo has to climb over 25 walls to rescue her. That is no easy task, each wall has a hidden surprise for him. To make his rescue bid more difficult not only has he to avoid all the traps but he must jump over different objects that are fired at hm.
